summary:
I am Finance & Control interim professional with a passion for Business Processes, Risk Management, and Information Management. I like to pick up challenges and to be a front runner paving the way. My enthusiasm, strong analytical and good communication skills have proven to be important assets.

Education:
Executive Master in Finance & Control / Register Controller @ University Maastricht

Company / Clients:
DHL, Office Depot, DSM, Pragmatics, ABBOTT, Medtronic

If you want to know more about me, you can contact me via wduchossoy@home.nl or 
tel: +31 (0)6 306 245 84.

Thank you for visiting my LinkedIn profile!

Best regards,

Ward

treasury_media.title: Home
treasury_media.description: Pragmatics zet finance professionals in bij opdrachtgevers in heel Limburg en Noord-Brabant. Of je nu op zoek bent naar een startende topper of een financial die door de wol is geverfd, we gaan altijd op zoek naar de perfecte match! Onze inzet is een...

contributors.headline: Transform to sustainability in agro and food

profile_positions.description: In this role I am responsible for the financials of the sales organization of UK, Ireland, Benelux and Nordics. I am leading a team of local controllers each focusing on a part of the region.
profile_positions.title: Regional Controller North Western Europe

profile_positions.description: As a result of the Finance Optimization Program, the Controller at that time left the company. I was asked to take the role as Interim Controller UK and Ireland. In this role, I overlooked the Financials of the UK and Ireland Sales Organization. At that point in time the Finance Optimization Program was just in its final stage. Meaning that at lot of loose ends needed to be solved.
profile_positions.title: Controller UK & Ireland (via Pragmatics)

profile_positions.description: During the Finance Optimization Program in Medtronic, I was asked to back fill the Senior Accountant that was occupied in the optimization program; moving day-to-day activities towards the SSC. In this role I was responsblbe for Tax Accounting, Payroll and Rebates, next to that I took the lead in the Medpoints project (Loyalty Program).
profile_positions.title: Senior Accountant UK (via Pragmatics)

profile_positions.description: In this role I was part of the EMEA Controlling Team. This team managed the Balance Sheet for the EMEA region by identifying and managing risk and opportunities in such a way that they are in control at period end. My particular role was to lead several projects that lead to more control and less exposure. Some examples where the Introduction of the New Lease Accounting Standard under US GAAP, Cleansing of Old PO's that were triggering unnecessary accruals and setting up a process to prevent this in the future from happening.
profile_positions.title: Principal Analyst EMEA Controlling (via Pragmatics)

company.name: Zuyd Hogeschool | Zuyd University of Applied Sciences

profile_positions.company: Zuyd Hogeschool | Zuyd University of Applied Sciences
profile_positions.description:
As  a second Examiner in the area of finance, I am responsible for objectively assess the graduation thesis of the students according to the criteria set by the Zuyd University of Applied Sciences. 
This is a part-time activity providing me the ability to support young professionals and learn about new development in the area of finance.
profile_positions.title: Thesis Examiner

profile_positions.description: I have supported the Gemeente Heerlen with their challenge to strenghten their financial foundation for the coming years. The method of use was Scrum. I provided an outside in view and structure during the sessions. At the end, I translated the results into Management Information.
profile_positions.title: External Advisor Scrum Sessions (via Pragmatics)

profile_positions.description: The Senior Financial Analyst is expected to work independently in a team with other Financial Analysts to drive for timely and accurate analyses on financial processes, propose process improvements and cost improvements. The role also keeps close contact to our financial service providers. The Sr. Financial Analyst reports to the Finance Director.
profile_positions.title: Senior Financial Analyst (via Pragmatics)

profile_positions.description:
The Business Process Consultant MDM is responsible for identifying and executing process improvements in the area of Master Data Management for DSM globally.

Successes:
- Create a new customer design for DSM Food Specialties to improve business processes and management reporting.
- Create and report out the MDM Heat Map to CIO to establish strategic direction of the improvements needed in the area of MDM.
profile_positions.title: Business Process Consultant Master Data Management

profile_positions.description:
The Intercompany Controller is responsible to optimize the intercompany processes in DSM to enable a harmonized fast perodic close. In the Finance Shared Service Center the Intercompany Controller leads a team based in Europe, India, Singapore, China and US that processes the intercompany transactions based upon online agreements between DSM entities.

Successes:
-	Best Financial Shared Service Team in 2014
-	Increasing span of control of Intercompany team to intercompany goods flows
-	First team to establish connection and cooperation with LATAM units
-	Improving the number of intercompany mismatches from over 10,000 to less than 100
profile_positions.title: Intercompany Controller DSM

profile_positions.description:
The Project Manager is responsible for managing the Intercompany Optimization project in the ARJUNA Program; the ARJUNA program is a DSM Global initiative to create Financial Service Centers within DSM. 
The goal of the project is the creation of one efficient centralized intercompany invoicing (send & receipt), clearance, payment and reconciliation process based upon a documented agreement between sending & receiving parties.

Successes:
-	Development and global implementation of a standard process & tooling for intercompany services.
-	Creation of  a central intercompany organization in India and Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Intercompany Improvements

profile_positions.description:
The Project Controller is responsible for supporting the Business Controllers in the day to day management of projects by:
- setting up the business cases
- ensuring all Finance/Controlling requirements are included in the scope and delivered by the project
- managing the project budget and spend
- acting as a business partner for the Project Director
Next to the above the Project Controller improves financial business processes to optimize the DSM Dyneema business.
The Project Controller assists the Business Controller Life Protection with the control activities of this business unit

Successes: 
-	Creation of Research Center in Singapore in budget and timeline (project control and business processes)
-	Creation of management steering information for the DSM Dyneema Innovation department (project administration and reports)
-	Implementation of a new pricing methodology for the Life Protection Business Unit of Dyneema
-	Implementation of a standard commercial reporting for the Life Protection Business Unit
profile_positions.title: Project Controller

profile_positions.description:
A COA Auditor Commercial has to form an opinion on risk management, control and governance of the commercial processes of a DSM Unit during an audit with limited supervision. The COA Auditor informs the various management levels about the outcome of the audit and can advise management on actions to improve control of the observed risks. The COA needs to act in an international environment and is part of a multi-disciplinary team.

Achievements:
-	Business Unit DSM Food Specialties in Delft; Q3 2010
-	Production Site  DSM Anti Infectives in Delft; Q4 2010
-	Business Unit DSM Anti Infectives EMEA Netherlands in Delft; Q4 2010 (unannounced audit)
-	Business Unit DSM Anti Infectives EMEA Netherlands in Delft; Q1 2011  
-	Business Unit DSM Nutritional Products Greece in Athens, Q2 2011
profile_positions.title: Part time COA Auditor

profile_positions.description:
A Business Process Expert (OtC) leads functional changes or participates in business process development and implementation projects with minimal supervision. The environment to act in is complex and international. The work involves the re-engineering and designing of the business processes and implementing them at the customers (Business Groups).

Successes:
-	Implement a (Pilot) Master Data Work Flow at DSM Dyneema
-	Develop and implemented DSM globally Trade Control business processes
-	Implement OtC and Service Management processes for DSM BioSolutions (Italy) being part of a SAP implementation program
-	Implement Customer Relation Management for DSM Expert Center
profile_positions.title: Business Process Expert

profile_positions.description: A Senior Analyst Internal Compliance leads and conducts moderately complex internal control reviews. A senior works with process management on defining processes and identifying both key and non-key controls. A Senior ICC designs and develops testing procedures as well as performs, and/or supervises the completion of the internal controls testing. Senior conducts moderate process reviews with minimal supervision.
profile_positions.title: Senior Analyst Internal Compliance

profile_positions.description:
- Integrated several new countries (AR Ledger) while keeping the same head count.
- Integrated the AR processes of a merged business (Guilbert) into the department.
- Standardized the AR business processes.
- Increased the level of expertise of the total department ensuring that people were multifunctional.
- Improved total service towards Finance, Sales and Credit Collections.
- Promoted from Assistant Manager to Manager AR as of May 2003
profile_positions.title: Manager Accounts Receivable

profile_positions.description: The tasks consisted mainly of setting up harmonization business processes for the Credit Control department in the EFSS, in such a way that the business needs are clearly understood, defined and incorporated. The changes involved were focused on short-time benefits.
profile_positions.title: Process Improvement Coordinator

profile_positions.description: The tasks consisted mainly of setting up reporting processes for the Credit Control department in the EFSS, in such a way that the business needs were clearly understood, defined and incorporated.
profile_positions.title: Internal Analyst Credit Control

profile_positions.description: The tasks consisted mainly of allocating payments to invoices, managing the direct debits customers, and performing the daily and monthly reconciliation of the Accounts Receivable with the General Ledger.
profile_positions.title: Credit Administration Clerk

profile_positions.description:
In the first three months the tasks consisted mainly of developing the business processes of the Credit Control department in the European Shared Services Centre project. 
The last three months I have documented and learned the tasks of Credit Administration in the Credit Control department in DHL Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Process Trainee

volunteer_experiences.description: As part of the board I am responsible for the financial health of the organization. The organization provides the possibility to the local community to perform gymnastic (sport) activities for all ages.
I raised funds and participated in the cycling event climbing 6 times the mountain Alpe d'Huez in one day.
